oai_dc:dc.dc:title: In the Heart of Memphis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “In the Heart of Memphis, Tenn.” Color image of various buildings, including Commerce Building, Hotel Peabody (in background).

“Master David Meadows -- 5237 Emerson -- St. Louis -- Mo -- My darling David -- Miss you. See I told -- you I would write -- you today & I am -- instead of I not -- Have a nice trip -- home. Love & Kisses -- Enie”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: cityscapes; downtown; businesses;
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: E. C. Kropp Co., Milwaukee, Wis.
